original_command: circt-verilog --ir-hw source.sv | arcilator | opt -O0 | llc -O0 --filetype=obj -o test.o

reproduction.command: timeout 90 bash -c 'circt-verilog --ir-hw source.sv 2>&1 | arcilator 2>&1 | opt -O0 2>&1 | llc -O0 --filetype=obj -o /tmp/test.o 2>&1'
reproduction.reason: Command completed successfully without timeout or crash in current environment
